data.title: Pitch Perfect.....the comedy movie.
data.meta_description: I was reluctant to watch this because I always figured it was a chick movie. Well....I got bored one night and it came on tv.....i'll be damned if it wasnt...
data.text:
AngusMadeMeDoIt

Well-Known Member

Joined

Jun 8, 2014

Messages

583

Reaction score

411

Location

Louisville KY

Jun 29, 2014

#1

I was reluctant to watch this because I always figured it was a chick movie. Well....I got bored one night and it came on tv.....i'll be damned if it wasnt hysterical! Very cool movie. I've read that the people that sing in the movie actually recorded their own vocals. SO major props for that. Anybody seen this movie?

We tried to watch it a couple months ago (me and my wife) but the movie failed to hook us: after 10 minutes or so we gave up. It may be interesting to whose enjoy TV reality shows such as American Idol though.

#8

Trailer seems like a Glee meets "Scary Movie" style of spoof type thing?????

No car explosions....guns...Monty Python or any member of the original cast of Saturday Night live......I'm out.

But now if I had some of the damn RUM Angus is hording I could probably tolerate it. :-)
